channel.title: Context Engineering Daily - Prompt Engineering
channel.description: Latest Prompt Engineering news in Context Engineering

item.title: Federated Few-Shot Learning for Epileptic Seizure Detection Under Privacy Constraints
item.description: arXiv:2512.13717v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Many deep learning approaches have been developed for EEG-based seizure detection; however, most rely on access to large centralized annotated datasets. In clinical practice, EEG data are often scarce, patient-specific distributed across institutions,...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> few-shot learning, few-shot, arxiv, transformer, fine-tuning | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Context-Engineering - "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.
item.description: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy.
